### Example


{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AwsNative = Pulumi.AwsNative;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var awsAccountId = invoke.Account_id;
        var mountTargetVPC = new AwsNative.EC2.VPC("mountTargetVPC", new AwsNative.EC2.VPCArgs
        {
            CidrBlock = "172.31.0.0/16",
        });
        var mountTargetSubnetOne = new AwsNative.EC2.Subnet("mountTargetSubnetOne", new AwsNative.EC2.SubnetArgs
        {
            CidrBlock = "172.31.1.0/24",
            VpcId = mountTargetVPC.Id,
            AvailabilityZone = "us-east-1a",
        });
        var key = new AwsNative.KMS.Key("key", new AwsNative.KMS.KeyArgs
        {
            KeyPolicy = 
            {
                { "version", "2012-10-17" },
                { "id", "key-default-1" },
                { "statement", 
                {
                    
                    {
                        { "sid", "Allow administration of the key" },
                        { "effect", "Allow" },
                        { "principal", 
                        {
                            { "aws", $"arn:aws:iam::{awsAccountId}:root" },
                        } },
                        { "action", 
                        {
                            "kms:*",
                        } },
                        { "resource", 
                        {
                            "*",
                        } },
                    },
                } },
            },
        });
        var fileSystemResource = new AwsNative.EFS.FileSystem("fileSystemResource", new AwsNative.EFS.FileSystemArgs
        {
            AvailabilityZoneName = "us-east-1a",
            BackupPolicy = new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.FileSystemBackupPolicyArgs
            {
                Status = "ENABLED",
            },
            Encrypted = true,
            LifecyclePolicies = 
            {
                new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.FileSystemLifecyclePolicyArgs
                {
                    TransitionToIA = "AFTER_30_DAYS",
                },
            },
            FileSystemTags = 
            {
                new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.FileSystemElasticFileSystemTagArgs
                {
                    Key = "Name",
                    Value = "TestFileSystem",
                },
            },
            FileSystemPolicy = 
            {
                { "version", "2012-10-17" },
                { "statement", 
                {
                    
                    {
                        { "effect", "Allow" },
                        { "action", 
                        {
                            "elasticfilesystem:ClientMount",
                        } },
                        { "principal", 
                        {
                            { "aws", "arn:aws:iam::111122223333:role/EfsReadOnly" },
                        } },
                    },
                } },
            },
            KmsKeyId = key.Arn,
        });
        var mountTargetResource1 = new AwsNative.EFS.MountTarget("mountTargetResource1", new AwsNative.EFS.MountTargetArgs
        {
            FileSystemId = fileSystemResource.Id,
            SubnetId = mountTargetSubnetOne.Id,
            SecurityGroups = 
            {
                mountTargetVPC.Default_security_group,
            },
        });
        var accessPointResource = new AwsNative.EFS.AccessPoint("accessPointResource", new AwsNative.EFS.AccessPointArgs
        {
            FileSystemId = fileSystemResource.Id,
            PosixUser = new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.AccessPointPosixUserArgs
            {
                Uid = "13234",
                Gid = "1322",
                SecondaryGids = 
                {
                    "1344",
                    "1452",
                },
            },
            RootDirectory = new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.AccessPointRootDirectoryArgs
            {
                CreationInfo = new AwsNative.EFS.Inputs.AccessPointCreationInfoArgs
                {
                    OwnerGid = "708798",
                    OwnerUid = "7987987",
                    Permissions = "0755",
                },
                Path = "/testcfn/abc",
            },
        });
    }

}

```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}


```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws-native/sdk/go/aws/ec2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws-native/sdk/go/aws/efs"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws-native/sdk/go/aws/kms"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		awsAccountId := invoke.Account_id
		mountTargetVPC, err := ec2.NewVPC(ctx, "mountTargetVPC", &ec2.VPCArgs{
			CidrBlock: pulumi.String("172.31.0.0/16"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		mountTargetSubnetOne, err := ec2.NewSubnet(ctx, "mountTargetSubnetOne", &ec2.SubnetArgs{
			CidrBlock:        pulumi.String("172.31.1.0/24"),
			VpcId:            mountTargetVPC.ID(),
			AvailabilityZone: pulumi.String("us-east-1a"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		key, err := kms.NewKey(ctx, "key", &kms.KeyArgs{
			KeyPolicy: pulumi.Any{
				Version: "2012-10-17",
				Id:      "key-default-1",
				Statement: []map[string]interface{}{
					map[string]interface{}{
						"sid":    "Allow administration of the key",
						"effect": "Allow",
						"principal": map[string]interface{}{
							"aws": fmt.Sprintf("%v%v%v", "arn:aws:iam::", awsAccountId, ":root"),
						},
						"action": []string{
							"kms:*",
						},
						"resource": []string{
							"*",
						},
					},
				},
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		fileSystemResource, err := efs.NewFileSystem(ctx, "fileSystemResource", &efs.FileSystemArgs{
			AvailabilityZoneName: pulumi.String("us-east-1a"),
			BackupPolicy: &efs.FileSystemBackupPolicyArgs{
				Status: pulumi.String("ENABLED"),
			},
			Encrypted: pulumi.Bool(true),
			LifecyclePolicies: []efs.FileSystemLifecyclePolicyArgs{
				&efs.FileSystemLifecyclePolicyArgs{
					TransitionToIA: pulumi.String("AFTER_30_DAYS"),
				},
			},
			FileSystemTags: []efs.FileSystemElasticFileSystemTagArgs{
				&efs.FileSystemElasticFileSystemTagArgs{
					Key:   pulumi.String("Name"),
					Value: pulumi.String("TestFileSystem"),
				},
			},
			FileSystemPolicy: pulumi.Any{
				Version: "2012-10-17",
				Statement: []map[string]interface{}{
					map[string]interface{}{
						"effect": "Allow",
						"action": []string{
							"elasticfilesystem:ClientMount",
						},
						"principal": map[string]interface{}{
							"aws": "arn:aws:iam::111122223333:role/EfsReadOnly",
						},
					},
				},
			},
			KmsKeyId: key.Arn,
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = efs.NewMountTarget(ctx, "mountTargetResource1", &efs.MountTargetArgs{
			FileSystemId: fileSystemResource.ID(),
			SubnetId:     mountTargetSubnetOne.ID(),
			SecurityGroups: pulumi.StringArray{
				mountTargetVPC.Default_security_group,
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = efs.NewAccessPoint(ctx, "accessPointResource", &efs.AccessPointArgs{
			FileSystemId: fileSystemResource.ID(),
			PosixUser: &efs.AccessPointPosixUserArgs{
				Uid: pulumi.String("13234"),
				Gid: pulumi.String("1322"),
				SecondaryGids: pulumi.StringArray{
					pulumi.String("1344"),
					pulumi.String("1452"),
				},
			},
			RootDirectory: &efs.AccessPointRootDirectoryArgs{
				CreationInfo: &efs.AccessPointCreationInfoArgs{
					OwnerGid:    pulumi.String("708798"),
					OwnerUid:    pulumi.String("7987987"),
					Permissions: pulumi.String("0755"),
				},
				Path: pulumi.String("/testcfn/abc"),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```

{{< example python >}}


```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_aws_native as aws_native

aws_account_id = invoke.account_id
mount_target_vpc = aws_native.ec2.VPC("mountTargetVPC", cidr_block="172.31.0.0/16")
mount_target_subnet_one = aws_native.ec2.Subnet("mountTargetSubnetOne",
    cidr_block="172.31.1.0/24",
    vpc_id=mount_target_vpc.id,
    availability_zone="us-east-1a")
key = aws_native.kms.Key("key", key_policy={
    "version": "2012-10-17",
    "id": "key-default-1",
    "statement": [{
        "sid": "Allow administration of the key",
        "effect": "Allow",
        "principal": {
            "aws": f"arn:aws:iam::{aws_account_id}:root",
        },
        "action": ["kms:*"],
        "resource": ["*"],
    }],
})
file_system_resource = aws_native.efs.FileSystem("fileSystemResource",
    availability_zone_name="us-east-1a",
    backup_policy=aws_native.efs.FileSystemBackupPolicyArgs(
        status="ENABLED",
    ),
    encrypted=True,
    lifecycle_policies=[aws_native.efs.FileSystemLifecyclePolicyArgs(
        transition_to_ia="AFTER_30_DAYS",
    )],
    file_system_tags=[aws_native.efs.FileSystemElasticFileSystemTagArgs(
        key="Name",
        value="TestFileSystem",
    )],
    file_system_policy={
        "version": "2012-10-17",
        "statement": [{
            "effect": "Allow",
            "action": ["elasticfilesystem:ClientMount"],
            "principal": {
                "aws": "arn:aws:iam::111122223333:role/EfsReadOnly",
            },
        }],
    },
    kms_key_id=key.arn)
mount_target_resource1 = aws_native.efs.MountTarget("mountTargetResource1",
    file_system_id=file_system_resource.id,
    subnet_id=mount_target_subnet_one.id,
    security_groups=[mount_target_vpc.default_security_group])
access_point_resource = aws_native.efs.AccessPoint("accessPointResource",
    file_system_id=file_system_resource.id,
    posix_user=aws_native.efs.AccessPointPosixUserArgs(
        uid="13234",
        gid="1322",
        secondary_gids=[
            "1344",
            "1452",
        ],
    ),
    root_directory=aws_native.efs.AccessPointRootDirectoryArgs(
        creation_info=aws_native.efs.AccessPointCreationInfoArgs(
            owner_gid="708798",
            owner_uid="7987987",
            permissions="0755",
        ),
        path="/testcfn/abc",
    ))

```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws_native from "@pulumi/aws-native";

const awsAccountId = aws_native.getAccountId().then(invoke => invoke.accountId);
const mountTargetVPC = new aws_native.ec2.VPC("mountTargetVPC", {cidrBlock: "172.31.0.0/16"});
const mountTargetSubnetOne = new aws_native.ec2.Subnet("mountTargetSubnetOne", {
    cidrBlock: "172.31.1.0/24",
    vpcId: mountTargetVPC.id,
    availabilityZone: "us-east-1a",
});
const key = new aws_native.kms.Key("key", {keyPolicy: {
    version: "2012-10-17",
    id: "key-default-1",
    statement: [{
        sid: "Allow administration of the key",
        effect: "Allow",
        principal: {
            aws: `arn:aws:iam::${awsAccountId}:root`,
        },
        action: ["kms:*"],
        resource: ["*"],
    }],
}});
const fileSystemResource = new aws_native.efs.FileSystem("fileSystemResource", {
    availabilityZoneName: "us-east-1a",
    backupPolicy: {
        status: "ENABLED",
    },
    encrypted: true,
    lifecyclePolicies: [{
        transitionToIA: "AFTER_30_DAYS",
    }],
    fileSystemTags: [{
        key: "Name",
        value: "TestFileSystem",
    }],
    fileSystemPolicy: {
        version: "2012-10-17",
        statement: [{
            effect: "Allow",
            action: ["elasticfilesystem:ClientMount"],
            principal: {
                aws: "arn:aws:iam::111122223333:role/EfsReadOnly",
            },
        }],
    },
    kmsKeyId: key.arn,
});
const mountTargetResource1 = new aws_native.efs.MountTarget("mountTargetResource1", {
    fileSystemId: fileSystemResource.id,
    subnetId: mountTargetSubnetOne.id,
    securityGroups: [mountTargetVPC.defaultSecurityGroup],
});
const accessPointResource = new aws_native.efs.AccessPoint("accessPointResource", {
    fileSystemId: fileSystemResource.id,
    posixUser: {
        uid: "13234",
        gid: "1322",
        secondaryGids: [
            "1344",
            "1452",
        ],
    },
    rootDirectory: {
        creationInfo: {
            ownerGid: "708798",
            ownerUid: "7987987",
            permissions: "0755",
        },
        path: "/testcfn/abc",
    },
});

```

## VPC Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The VPC resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="cidrblock_csharp">
<a href="#cidrblock_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Cidr<wbr>Block</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The primary IPv4 CIDR block for the VPC.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="enablednshostnames_csharp">
<a href="#enablednshostnames_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Dns<wbr>Hostnames</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the instances launched in the VPC get DNS hostnames. If enabled, instances in the VPC get DNS hostnames; otherwise, they do not. Disabled by default for nondefault VPCs.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="enablednssupport_csharp">
<a href="#enablednssupport_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Dns<wbr>Support</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the DNS resolution is supported for the VPC. If enabled, queries to the Amazon provided DNS server at the 169.254.169.253 IP address, or the reserved IP address at the base of the VPC network range "plus two" succeed. If disabled, the Amazon provided DNS service in the VPC that resolves public DNS hostnames to IP addresses is not enabled. Enabled by default.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="instancetenancy_csharp">
<a href="#instancetenancy_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Instance<wbr>Tenancy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The allowed tenancy of instances launched into the VPC.

"default": An instance launched into the VPC runs on shared hardware by default, unless you explicitly specify a different tenancy during instance launch.

"dedicated": An instance launched into the VPC is a Dedicated Instance by default, unless you explicitly specify a tenancy of host during instance launch. You cannot specify a tenancy of default during instance launch.

Updating InstanceTenancy requires no replacement only if you are updating its value from "dedicated" to "default". Updating InstanceTenancy from "default" to "dedicated" requires replacement.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tags_csharp">
<a href="#tags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#vpctag">List&lt;Pulumi.<wbr>Aws<wbr>Native.<wbr>EC2.<wbr>Inputs.<wbr>VPCTag<wbr>Args&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The tags for the VPC.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language go %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="cidrblock_go">
<a href="#cidrblock_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Cidr<wbr>Block</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The primary IPv4 CIDR block for the VPC.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="enablednshostnames_go">
<a href="#enablednshostnames_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Dns<wbr>Hostnames</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the instances launched in the VPC get DNS hostnames. If enabled, instances in the VPC get DNS hostnames; otherwise, they do not. Disabled by default for nondefault VPCs.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="enablednssupport_go">
<a href="#enablednssupport_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Enable<wbr>Dns<wbr>Support</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Indicates whether the DNS resolution is supported for the VPC. If enabled, queries to the Amazon provided DNS server at the 169.254.169.253 IP address, or the reserved IP address at the base of the VPC network range "plus two" succeed. If disabled, the Amazon provided DNS service in the VPC that resolves public DNS hostnames to IP addresses is not enabled. Enabled by default.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="instancetenancy_go">
<a href="#instancetenancy_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Instance<wbr>Tenancy</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The allowed tenancy of instances launched into the VPC.

"default": An instance launched into the VPC runs on shared hardware by default, unless you explicitly specify a different tenancy during instance launch.

"dedicated": An instance launched into the VPC is a Dedicated Instance by default, unless you explicitly specify a tenancy of host during instance launch. You cannot specify a tenancy of default during instance launch.

Updating InstanceTenancy requires no replacement only if you are updating its value from "dedicated" to "default". Updating InstanceTenancy from "default" to "dedicated" requires replacement.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tags_go">
<a href="#tags_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#vpctag">[]VPCTag<wbr>Args</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The tags for the VPC.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws-native">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws-native</a></dd>
